channel.title: Will iran bomb and come to war with isreal
channel.description: hey ppl, alot of this talk about bombing has got me thinking will iran come to war with isreal and bomb them ?

item.title: Will iran bomb and come to war with isreal
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

briatwork:

Rabcarl I know precisely what I am talking about, Israel have been terrorising the Lebanese throughout my whole lifetime and before. I am a neutral in this, I live in the western world. I totally agree with the UN’s Kofi Annan that Israel MUST stop it’s bombing of Lebanon. However nothing will be done until America say so. Israel has quite literally got away with murder over tha decades because America backs them. The Lebanese terror campaign was and still is just a reaction to a super powers bully tactics. Lebanon always ends up worse off, the only nations in the world who can’t or won’t see this are Israel, America, and the UK. I strongly suspect you are from one of these countries.

What the hell are you on?
Im from the uk and i know for a fact that many people sympathise with the lebonese.
you cant just use formal language to try and prove that a whole nation has one view on the war.
I think you should get more evidence before you judge an entire nation.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nhawkesn nhawkesn
item.description:
@nhawkesn wrote:

irfan786:

You were calling all muslims religionous fanatics. No denying it when you can just scroll up and look at your previous post. And even if they are “messing up the world” you still have no right in talking about any religion that way. And before you go on about any religion, maybe you should reasearch atleast a little bit of it? You are really starting to look like a 11 year old who knows nothing of the world.

well i explained what i meant, you can carry on pretending thats not what i meant to make yourself feel better if you like.

can you explain to me one thing…

how comes the USA (made up of mostly Christians), China (mostly Buddhists, Christians) and most of Europe (mostly Christians) in the modern days, are the most technologically advanced and the people that are actually trying to push the world forward and create and find fantastic new things…

whereas most muslim countries are decades behind them and are still letting terrorist groups and religious fanatics rise and gain momentum in their own countries

item.title: Will iran bomb and come to war with isreal
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

And even if they are "messing up the world" you still have no right in talking about any religion that way.

He doesn’t have the right? I believe we actually do have the right to free speech. You’re just proving how close minded you are with your ranting.

Islam is obviously not made up completely of religious fanatics, and the true nature of the religion is obviously one that teaches love and not war. However, given that Islam is used as an excuse for a great deal of sectarian violence, it’s understandable that some of the children on this forum use “Insane Milita Men” and “Muslims” interchangeably. It is important to understand that Christianity and Judaism are just as responsible for the deaths of people who “Don’t worship god correctly”, but your never going to convince anyone of anything, Irfan, if you continute in your close minded “You don’t have the right to free speech” ranting.

well they care now all of a sudden… well its too late, israel are doing what they had to do.

USA and UK are supporting Israel because we created the country after ww2, the jews had to go somewhere, and as “iamadam” said, it was jewish land originally.
these religious fanatics (aiming that at muslims) will not stop until israel is no longer in existance… Israel wont ever give up theyre place of living (and why should they?)

it wont end until something absolutely huge happens

item.title: Will iran bomb and come to war with isreal
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

briatwork:

Rabcarl I know precisely what I am talking about, Israel have been terrorising the Lebanese throughout my whole lifetime and before. I am a neutral in this, I live in the western world. I totally agree with the UN’s Kofi Annan that Israel MUST stop it’s bombing of Lebanon. However nothing will be done until America say so. Israel has quite literally got away with murder over tha decades because America backs them. The Lebanese terror campaign was and still is just a reaction to a super powers bully tactics. Lebanon always ends up worse off, the only nations in the world who can’t or won’t see this are Israel, America, and the UK. I strongly suspect you are from one of these countries.

As I said, this whole war was started when two of Isralies(Sp) got captued by the Lebonese. Also, the Lebonese government is corrupt to the core. It is controlled by a radical Muslim group, and the real government is being supressed because it is not powerful enough to deal with it.

Anyways, I’m assuming no one on this forum is living even close to Israel. It’s not our war, and we shouldn’t be sticking our noses into their business.

@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Iamadam, post:50, topic:5562”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=7371.msg104801#msg104801 date=1154243381]
The palestinians have always resisted israelis ever since their land was stolen. Its only been 60 years now if you were to think anyone is to forget well then your wrong. Furthermore Israel was terrorising palestinans long before any palestinian resistance. The killing of civillians is wrong but when you have no other weapon you will go by your last resort no matter what.As for hezbollah, what are they doing thats making them terrorists and israel isnt?
[/quote]
I’m pretty sure it was Israels land first. Romans took it in 70AD. The bible predicted that the Jews would get their land back. They got it back.[/quote]
Thats 100’s of years ago. Muslims Owned it until 1948, the thing is that there are many people who have been kicked out of there and are now suffering under poverty. If they even say they want their land back they would be called terrorists. Israel kills 600 people mostly women and children but they have the right to?
